subject: Sales
title: Closing Over the Phone
description: A fast breakdown of Closing Over the Phone for builders.

hook.text: Without body language, phone sellers lose 55% of communication cues. Every single word matters more.

buildup.text: Phone closing depends on voice alone: tone, pace, pauses, and energy replace all visual signals.

discovery.text: A brief pause right before the ask creates tension and anticipation. Phone silence builds pressure.

twist.text: The phone's constraint is its hidden strength. No distractions means the message hits much harder.

climax.text: Master the pause. Let your strongest point breathe. On the phone, what you don't say matters most.

punchline.text: On the phone, silence is the most powerful tool.

quiz.question: What makes phone closing uniquely challenging?
options: Losing 55% of communication cues without body language
